content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Funny marriage criteria ;-) !
+ good Clash idea :+1: ...
=> nice to code !

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Could be interesting for shortest

Output section
* Please delete "Next".

Constraints section
* Please mention that [[boyFullName]] always consists of two words.

Stub generator
* Suggest to change "aGirl" and "aBoy" to "girlFirstName" and "boyFullName" respectively for consistency.

Just an observation: I've had a quick glance at the cases and there seems to be no cases where two girls should marry the same boy?

Thanks.

re: Just an observation: I've had a quick glance at the cases and there seems to be no cases where two girls should marry the same boy?

Yes, in cases where my test-creation-code produced that, I deleted those.  We don't want multiple girls to fight for a single boy. :)

(I made other changes now, I believe ... thanks as always)
